meanings.sent1: Many lifes are filled with joy and laughter.
meanings.sent2: The book described the different lifes of animals in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The lifes of the ants in the colony were quite busy and organized.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the blooming flowers brought color to the lifes of the visitors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher shared stories about the different lifes of people around the world.

meanings.definition: The third person singular form of life.
meanings.sent1: He enjoys the simple things in lifes, like a walk in the park.
meanings.sent2: She values the importance of every lifes, no matter how small.
meanings.sent3: The cat's lifes seemed quite luxurious with all the naps it took.
meanings.sent4: The lifes of the characters in the novel intertwined in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the microscopic lifes found in the pond water.
